task.title: Managing device state
task.shortdesc: Issue Android Debug Bridge (adb) commands to manage the state of real or emulated devices.

step.cmd: Switch to the Device Management view.
Right-click an Android handset or running AVD.
step.info: The AVD must be running; start if, if necessary.

step.cmd: From the menu that appears, select ADB Shell.
step.stepresult: The Console view is opened or brought forward, and an adb shell console for the selected device is displayed. Use it to issue adb shell commands.

taskbody.postreq: Note that you can switch the Console view between various consoles by clicking (Display Selected Console).
